name: Garden's Shelling
description:
CONTROLS :

Right mouse : Select/action 
Left mouse : Cancel selection  
Middle mouse (or Escape) : Open Menu

HOW TO PLAY : 

Goal: Reduce the blue opponant gauge 
Game over: When your blue gauge is depleted

HOW TO SEED :

Left click on the empty pot with action point for open the seed menu

LEXIC :

Yellow Gauge = photosynthesis is done when the gauge is full
Plants attacks when photosynthesis is complete
Browns Mark = Action Points for seeding or swapping your existing plant
(It is also depleted during photosynthesis and refill at the end)
When a plant is dying the owner also receive some damage!

ELEMENTARY COMBO :

The game contains an elementary combo system that gives damage bonuses even AoE, you be able to guess them?
Thermal shock (Ice+Fire) = Damage *2 on the last hit
Electrocharge (Thunder+Fire) = 75% of damage to adgacents plants
Icy shard (Ice+Thunder) = 10 Damage/s in 5 secondes to the affected pot or until a plant dies

THE PLANTPEDIA (current version) :

Fire plant : 50HP 20 DAMAGE inflic burn, target the nearest (slow projectile)
Ice plant : 150HP 10 DAMAGE inflic freeze, and  target the nearest (normal projectile)
Thunder plant : 100HP 20 DAMAGE inflic electrocution, target the highest HP (just thunder)

CREDITS :

  • Music used: "Challenge Accepted!" by HeatleyBros
  • Sounds effects provided by "Retro 8 Bit Sounds" from GameMaster Audio
